procedures.name: First Run Discovery
procedures.description: Capture initial user context, documents, and interview insights to establish a baseline purpose and strategy.
procedures.rollback_plan: Revert to prior purpose/strategy and re-interview the user.

tasks.name: Collect user identity and disambiguation links
tasks.description: Gather user name and confirm public profile links to avoid misidentification.

tasks.name: Collect user documents and sources
tasks.description: Request access to relevant docs (Notion, Obsidian, files) and confirm what should be analyzed.

tasks.name: Analyze documents for needs and active work
tasks.description: Summarize current projects, goals, constraints, and pain points from provided materials.

tasks.name: Prepare discovery interview plan
tasks.description: Draft focused questions based on known context.

tasks.name: Conduct discovery interview
tasks.description: Run the interview and capture answers verbatim.

tasks.name: Propose initial purpose and strategy
tasks.description: Draft purpose, objectives, and KPIs based on the interview.
